snippet: Martin Redlicki, an American whose parents were born in Poland, and Kamil Majhrzak, who is from the small Polish town of Piotrkow, won the U.S. Open boys doubles title.
abstract: Martin Redlicki, an American whose parents were born in Poland, and Kamil Majhrzak, who is from the small Polish town of Piotrkow, won the U.S. Open boys doubles title.

headline.main: Polish Connection Leads to Surprising Boys' Doubles Title
